body:
Spoiler: 

So apparently Izumi had a lover before, her senpai (or at least had a sexual relationship) before (#221154) but she slowly starts liking Suzu, she even kisses her and they finally talk things out and end up having lovey dovey sex (#221155)

There’s no chapter 7 here but it looks like Izumi had another older gf  (#221157) but reassures Suzu that she’s the only one she  loves now. 

Chapter 9 is the last one and it began with Izumi dreaming about her ex (#221158, apparently she just disappeared out of the blue, there are missing papers) and waking up next to Suzu and feeling kinda guilty but realizes that she feels fluffy with Suzu. Then after the family drama is over it all ends with Suzu and Izumi walking and holding hands by the beach where they met.
It had been 2 years. I wonder what happened to this series.
lmao that was actually funny xd
Oh shit... Can't wait for chapter 2.
